title: How to Make No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies

steps.headline: In a saucepan, bring the sugar, cocoa, butter, milk, and salt to a rapid boil for about 1 minute.
Take the pan off the stove and add the quick cooking oats, peanut butter, and vanilla to the mixture.
Working quickly, drop a tablespoon of the batter onto the cookie sheet.
Let them cool and harden in the fridge.
Serve them cold or at room temperature and enjoy!

text: In a saucepan, bring the sugar, cocoa, butter, milk, and salt to a rapid boil for about 1 minute.  Take the pan off the stove and add the quick cooking oats, peanut butter, and vanilla to the mixture. Mix well. Working quickly, drop a tablespoon of the batter onto the cookie sheet.  Let them cool and harden in the fridge.  Serve them cold or at room temperature and enjoy!  Finished.
